data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 2, Ataru Esaka for Kashiwa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Tokyo advance rapidly upfield but Nobutsugu Murakami blows for offside.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 3, Masato Morishige for Tokyo has been booked by Nobutsugu Murakami and receives a first yellow card.
Tokyo's Leandro gets in a shot on goal at Ajinomoto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 4, In Tokyo, Takumi Nakamura of Tokyo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Tokyo.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Tokyo's Adailton gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.
In the minute 15, Tokyo have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Tokyo.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 21, Adailton of Tokyo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Michael Olunga (Kashiwa) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 23, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Tokyo's half.
In the minute 27, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
Hayato Nakama gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kashiwa.
In the minute 28, Goal! Kashiwa have got their heads in front thanks to a Ataru Esaka strike.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Adailton (Tokyo) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 30, Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
In the minute 31, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Masatoshi Mihara (Kashiwa) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 33, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Taichi Hara is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Taichi Hara has recovered and rejoins the match in Tokyo.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Tokyo.
Yojiro Takahagi (Tokyo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 38, Tokyo drive upfield and Yojiro Takahagi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Tokyo's half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Tokyo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.
Kashiwa to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Tokyo are caught offside.
Tokyo pushes forward through Adailton, whose finish on goal is saved.
The first-half is over at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Cristiano extends Kashiwa's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 46, Michael Olunga with an assist there.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Tokyo.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Tokyo, close to Kashiwa's area.
In the minute 50, Adailton (Tokyo) heads in to reduce the deficit to 1-2.
Yojiro Takahagi instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 51, Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Tokyo's Manato Shinada has been booked in Tokyo.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Kashiwa's Ataru Esaka misses with an attempt on goal.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Adailton (Tokyo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In the minute 56, Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Tokyo.
Throw-in Tokyo.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Kenta Hasegawa is making the team's first substitution at Ajinomoto Stadium with Shuto Abe replacing Manato Shinada.
The home team have replaced Takuya Uchida with Diego Oliveira. This is the second substitution made today by Kenta Hasegawa.
In the minute 61, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Tokyo's half.
In the minute 62, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
The away team replace Kengo Kitazume with Naoki Kawaguchi.
Throw-in Tokyo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Tokyo drives forward and Yojiro Takahagi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 64, In Tokyo, Tokyo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In Tokyo Tokyo attack through Taichi Hara. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 67, Kashiwa have a goal kick.
At Ajinomoto Stadium, Shuto Abe has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Kashiwa.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tokyo push forward at Ajinomoto Stadium and Adailton gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Kashiwa defence.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 71, Taichi Hara's header is off-target for Tokyo.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Hiroto Goya is replacing Hayato Nakama for the away team.
In the minute 73, Yuta Someya is replacing Tatsuya Yamashita for Kashiwa at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Tokyo make their third substitution with Hirotaka Mita replacing Taichi Hara.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kashiwa take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Cristiano.
Great play from Michael Olunga to set up the goal.
In the minute 78, Tokyo needs to be cautious. Kashiwa have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, Kyosuke Tagawa is on a sub for Adailton for Tokyo.
Michael Olunga hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Kashiwa.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
In the minute 83, Tokyo's Takumi Nakamura is on target but unsuccessful.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa are pushing forward but Hiroto Goya's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 85, Yojiro Takahagi is booked for the home team.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Tokyo throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Important block from the Kashiwa defence as Leandro fires in a strike for Tokyo.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Free kick Kashiwa.
In the minute 88, Nobutsugu Murakami awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Kashiwa push forward at Ajinomoto Stadium and Cristiano gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tokyo defence.
At Ajinomoto Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Hiroto Goya (Kashiwa) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Kashiwa.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Tokyo, close to Kashiwa's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Yuta Someya (Kashiwa) has received a yellow card from Nobutsugu Murakami.
